director.name: 摩根·史柏路克 Morgan Spurlock

introduction: CNN’s popular original series "Morgan Spurlock Inside Man," produced and hosted by Oscar®-nominated documentary filmmaker Morgan Spurlock, will return on Sunday, April 13, 2014 at 10pm ET/PT. Each week during the all-new season of eight hourlong episodes, Spurlock will immerse himself in topical subjects while offering an intimate look into diverse aspects of the human condition. Topics will include “Celebrity,” (the job of satisfying the public's constant appetite for the famous), “Income Disparity” (the 1% vs. the 99%), and “The Future” (where Spurlock goes on an epic quest to live forever).
